name: Flying Cloud Flag Formation
description:
When your character uses a Normal Attack: Deal +1 DMG.
If you have no more than 1 card in your Hand, this Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)
